nothing.message:
OH @{username} YOU FISHED UP A FLOATING BOTTLE! 
INSIDE IT THERE IS A RIPPED NOTE 📜 
IT IS MARKED WITH THE NUMERAL " I " AND IT READS: 
 " 𝔰𝔬𝔪𝔢𝔬𝔫𝔢 𝔥𝔞𝔰 𝔥𝔦𝔡𝔡𝔢𝔫 𝔞 𝔠𝔩𝔲𝔢 𝔬𝔫 𝔱𝔥𝔢 𝔖𝔖𝔐𝔖𝔖 𝔣𝔯𝔬𝔫𝔱 𝔭𝔞𝔤𝔢 𝔦𝔱 𝔰𝔢𝔢𝔪𝔰 𝔱𝔬 𝔥𝔞𝔳𝔢 𝔞 𝔩𝔦𝔫𝓴 𝔱𝔬 𝔱𝔬 𝔴𝔥𝔞𝔱 𝔰𝔢𝔢𝔪𝔰 𝔱𝔬 𝔟𝔢 𝒹𝓇.𝑜𝓈𝒸 ..."
nothing.unlock_message: @{username} as you reel in your line, a strange sigil glows on your hand for a moment before fading. The next casts will be... interesting...

nothing.message:
OH @{username} YOU FISHED UP A FLOATING BOTTLE! 
INSIDE IT THERE IS A RIPPED NOTE 📜 
IT IS MARKED WITH THE NUMERAL " II " AND IT READS: 
 "𝔫𝔬 𝔴𝔞𝔦𝔱, 𝔱𝔥𝔞𝔱 𝔰𝔢𝔢𝔪𝔰 𝔱𝔬 𝔟𝔢 𝔦𝔫𝔠𝔬𝔯𝔯𝔢𝔠𝔱 𝔱𝔥𝔢 𝔩𝔢𝔱𝔱𝔢𝔯𝔰 𝔞𝔯𝔢 𝔰𝔠𝔯𝔞𝔪𝔟𝔩𝔢𝔡! 𝔱𝔥𝔞𝔱 𝔰𝔥𝔬𝔲𝔩𝔡 𝔡𝔬 𝔦𝔱 ... 𝒾𝒹 / 𝐸𝟤𝓋 ..."
nothing.unlock_message: The water stirs, and a new shadow appears in the depths, @{username}  You feel a pull towards something... different...

nothing.message:
OH @{username} YOU FISHED UP A FLOATING BOTTLE! 
INSIDE IT THERE IS A RIPPED NOTE 📜 
IT IS MARKED WITH THE NUMERAL " III " AND IT READS: 
 "𝔬𝓴𝔞𝔂 𝔱𝔥𝔢 𝔣𝔦𝔫𝔞𝔩 𝔩𝔢𝔱𝔱𝔢𝔯𝔰, 𝔪𝔞𝔶𝔟𝔢 𝔱𝔥𝔦𝔰 𝔴𝔦𝔩𝔩 𝔩𝔢𝔞𝔡 𝔱𝔬 𝔰𝔬𝔪𝔢𝔱𝔥𝔦𝔫𝔤! W𝒷Y𝒷G𝒻H"
